text: Hermann Nitsch (29 August 1938 – 18 April 2022) was an Austrian avant-garde artist. He worked in experimental and multimedia art works. He was a main representative of the Viennese Actionism. Nitsch died on 18 April 2022 in Mistelbach, Austria at the age of 83.Aktionskünstler Hermann Nitsch ist tot auf orf.at ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian artists Category:Writers from Vienna
title: Hermann Nitsch
